topic.fullpath: Topic :: Formats and Protocols :: Data Formats

name: SocketRocket
short_description: A simple socket server that lets you send/receive data via TCP on a given port. The data to send can be defined in an XML form and can be altered on the fly before sending. Given the flexibility you can spoof whole sessions to test your software.
